title: ANI Shares 2019 Visuals As ‘Ceasefire Violation By Pak Along LoC’
subtitle: Pakistan Ceasefire Violation on LoC Fact Check: On 12 June, news agency ANI shared old visuals as “unprovoked ceasefire violation by Pakistan along the LoC.” The visuals used by ANI are not recent and could be traced back to October 2019.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
On 12 June, news agency ANI shared old visuals as “unprovoked ceasefire violation by Pakistan along the LoC.”

As per news reports, there has been unprovoked shelling in Baramulla and Poonch districts resulting in the death of a 40-year-old woman, but the visuals used by ANI are not recent and could be traced back to October 2019.
